description.value:
+5 to Ballistic Skill Tests made whilst the Squad is firing from cover. Medals can't be acquired, only earned, benefit applied to the whole squad. Looks Like a Two Crossed Spades, hanging from a triangular grey ribbon

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Awarded for Participating in a single trench deployment lasting for two months or more.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
